From: Basomedial nucleus of the amygdala posterior part (BMAp)
Description: Unlike the accessory basal nucleus, the oval-shaped portion of the anterior cortical nucleus projected heavily to the anterior amygdaloid area (Table 1).
Reference: Savander V., Go... - Intrinsic connections of the rat... (1996) , pp. 291-313

Description: Collator note: strong labeling in the caudal AAA. See Fig. 5E, Swanson Atlas Levels 24-25.
Reference: Behan M. & Haberly... - Intrinsic and efferent connections of... (1999) , pp. 522-548

Description: Collator note: strong labeling above the COAa, mapped here in BMA and AAA. See Fig.6E, which roughly corresponds to Swanson Atlas Levels 23-25.
Reference: Luskin M.B & Price... - The topographic organization of... (1983) , pp. 264-291

Description: The projection to the central nuclear region, [] was very similar to the pattern seen with rostral IL injections; labeled fibers were observed primarily in the CLC, substantia innominata, and the anterior amygdaloid area []. Collator note: Swanson Atlas LEvels 24-26 (-1.3 - -1.8 mm from bregma).
Reference: Mcdonald AJ,... - Projections of the medial and lateral... (1996) , pp. 55-75

Description: Collator note: clear labeling of the AAA, at leas caudally. See Fig. 15E, Swanson Atlas Levels 24-25 (-1.4 mm from bregma).
Reference: Shi C.J & Cassell... - Cortical, thalamic, and amygdaloid... (1998) , pp. 440-468

From: Bed nuclei of the stria terminalis posterior division transverse nucleus (BSTtr)
Description: These fibers [ansa penducularis] also provide moderate to dense inputs to the anterior amygdalar area and anterior basomedial nucleus (Fig. 6JO) and a light input to the anterior cortical nucleus (Fig. 6KO).
Reference: Dong H.W., Swanson... - Projections from bed nuclei of the stria... (2004) , pp. 396-433

Description: Dense terminal and nonterminal fiber labeling was also observed in the substantia innominata and anterior amygdaloid area (Fig. 3, level - 1.3). Collator note: Swanson Atlas Levels 23-24.
Reference: Mcdonald AJ,... - Projections of the medial and lateral... (1996) , pp. 55-75

Description: Anterograde label in the amygdaloid complex was restricted to the ipsilateral anterior amygdaloid area, the deep part of the anterior cortical nucleus (ACN) and the area between the basomedial, central and medial nuclei at all levels (Fig. 5A). Collator note: at least moderate labeling of the caudal AAA. See Fig. 5A, Swanson Atlas Levels 22-23.
Reference: Cassell M.D. &... - Topography of projections from the... (1986) , pp. 321-333

Description: Amygdaloid labeling was fairly pronounced and was primarily restricted to the anterior amygdaloid area, the central nucleus (CEA), and parts of the anterior cortical and medial nuclei. Collator note: Fig 3M-P, Swanson Atlas Levels 21-26. Parts of the BLA
Reference: Hoover W.B & Vertes... - Projections of the medial orbital and... (2011) , pp. 3766-3801
